title: Villa Pamphili
description: The church of San Pancrazio was founded in the sixth century A.D. by Pope Symmachus. It stands beyond the Porta San Pancrazio on the Ianiculum. Below the church is a massive catacomb referred to as S. Pancrazio or Ottavilla.

properties.description: Representative point location for the Basilica e Catacombe di San Pancrazio, site precision.
properties.title: DARE Location
